verbs.description: [ARG0: pharmacist] [V: denies] [ARGM-GOL: woman] [ARG1: miscarriage medication] [ARGM-CAU: over religious beliefs] the aclu sent a letter of complaint to the meijer supermarket chain saying one of their michigan pharmacists denied medication to a woman citing religion rachel peterson meijer u s ulcers ionia pharmacy american civil liberties union misoprostol richard kalkman merissa kovach ionia meijer pharmacy pharmacist michigan
